Candidate No.:   61564  
 
 
PERSONAL DETAILS  
  
Location:    Italy, I nternationally Mob ile 
 
 
QUALIFICATIONS  
 
BSc: INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY.   
 
 
CAREER SUMMARY  
 
Aug 2019 – Date : Present Company  
Position: Sr. Cybersecu rity ICS Specialist - Industrial Control Systems  
 
• Design, implement, supervise and provide deliverables for a new SOC/NOC security centre .  
 
• IT/OT cybersecurity, working in a team -oriented environment . Biggest LNG company in the world. 
Approve, design, lead  and validate solutions for both ICS (Industrial Control Systems ) and SIS (Safety 
Instrumented Systems ) in a complex and unique LNG plant in the Middle  - East.  
 
• Apply the best practices of Cybersecurity engineering  - Design and monitor engineering activities for a 
new SOC/NOC centre : Ensure the engineering design meets system safety, reliability, availability and in 
compliance with local and company policies and procedures.  
 
• Lead and approve engineering details for IT/OT solutions while integrating 18 different OEM(s) t o ensure 
availability, integrity and confidentiality for the company.  
 
• Lead  & Coordinate Cybersecurity/Safety Risk Assessments; qualified by QG company following internal 
process.   
 
• Approve Cybersecurity Project Specifications and Design Basis documents, appro ve engineering 
documents developed by Contractors ensuring timely execution to match business expectations and site 
execution.  
 
• Approve system architecture/design hardware, software, and licensing requirements of the project. 
Provide engineering inputs and guidance to teams and contractors involved in the project.  
 
• Perform related Site Execution activities to ensure project quality and standards, attend and validate 
FAT/SAT/iSAT.  
 
Jan 2019 – Aug 2019 : Previous Company          
Position: Project Manager  
 
• Management po sition in small -mid size (150+) chemical/pharma company to deliver timely project 
execution and elaborate business plans.  
 
 • Team management and site coordination , after-sales service and maintenance contract plan (3MM+).  
 
• Team management and site coordin ation on brand new chemical plant  and installation.  
 
• Support ing sales , to define product qualification and requirements. Additional roles such Sales 
Negotiation, HSE coordinator/ facilitator and logistics management.  
 
May 20 13 – Jan 2019 : Previous Company  
Position: Remote Monitoring & Diagnostic: Lead service engineer, IoT 
 
• Lead Engineer for Remote Monitoring & Diagnostic Turbine Service and digital product portfolio: as part 
of work routine, I was involved in Design, Site  Implementation and R&D for product development in 
cybersecurity and Industrial Controls Systems (ICS/IACS). Wide spectrum of skills and activities involved 
in this process including IT/OT engineering and technical sales aimed to deliver solutions and prod uct for 
end-user O&G customers.  
 
• “Order to Remittance”: Perform and execute projects both in -house or at site, coordinate suppliers, lead 
field service engineer teams, cooperate in a cross functional organization, project management . 
 
• Technical sales support for product design, qualification and requirements. Active role in negotiation with 
customers worldwide. Remote Monitoring & Diagnostic, Cybersecurity and Digital Services (Energy - Oil 
and Gas)   
 
2009 - May 2013 : Previous Company  
Position: IT/OT and Building automation: development, implementation, troubleshooting.  
 
2007 -2009 : Previous Company  
Position: IT solutions: development, implementation, troubleshooting . 
  
2005 -2007 : Previous Company  
Position: IT solutions development, implementation, troubleshooting  
 
 
COMMENT  
 
Strong and competen t, with a passion and proficiency in Cybersecurity and Industrial IT/OT solutions. Noteworthy 
results in Engineering, Architecture Design, Project Execution and Project Management. Highly professional 
candidate aiming to work in a dynamic and innovative environment . Willing to travel and relocate for business 
purposes.  
 
 
Skills and Knowledge:  
Implement , design and review Cybersecurity and Industrial standards i n major key -projects fo

career_advancement: Focus on building core technical skills
Seek mentorship from senior team members
Take on challenging projects to gain experience
